name: DefaultTextStyle
desc: The text style to apply to descendant [Text] widgets which don't have an explicit style.

fields.name: textAlign
fields.desc: How each line of text in the Text widget should be aligned horizontally.

fields.name: softWrap
fields.desc: Whether the text should break at soft line breaks.

fields.name: overflow
fields.desc: How visual overflow should be handled.

fields.name: maxLines
fields.desc: An optional maximum number of lines for the text to span, wrapping if necessary. If the text exceeds the given number of lines, it will be truncated according to [overflow].

fields.name: textWidthBasis
fields.desc: The strategy to use when calculating the width of the Text.

nodes.name: DefaultTextStyle Usage
desc: The properties are the same as Text, see details there.
Its function is: Set the default text style to be applied to [descendant widgets], note that descendant widgets can also specify their own styles.
